name: Gifts for the happy traveller
tagline: A collection of gifts for anyone in your life who travels. Help them travel in style and comfort.

gifts.name: Peace out puffy eyes
gifts.description: These soothing under-eye patches will brighten up tired-looking eyes in 15 minutes. Perfect for the sleep-deprived and frequent travellers.

image.alt_text: Image of Peace out puffy eyes. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush
gifts.description: Small, sustainable and the battery lasts for ages - whats not to love!

image.alt_text: Image of SURI Sustainable Electric Toothbrush. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Marshall travel speaker (mini)
gifts.description: Stylish and portable with a great sound. This is the ideal speaker to take away with you.

image.alt_text: Image of Marshall travel speaker (mini). A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: AirPods Max
gifts.description: Who doesn't need a pair of top quality headphones? These are the ones.

image.alt_text: Image of AirPods Max. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Away carry on luggage
gifts.description: Travel in style with the perfect carry-on suitcase from Away. Feeling cool? Opt for the suitcase with built-in battery for all your charging needs.

image.alt_text: Image of Away carry on luggage. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Slip silk eye mask
gifts.description: Treat your eyes with the luxurious slip eye mask. Soft, delicate and a joy to sleep in.

image.alt_text: Image of Slip silk eye mask. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush
gifts.description: A great facial cleanser that you can travel with.

image.alt_text: Image of FOREO Luna mini facial cleansing brush. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of Aesop Aromatique Hand Balm. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: AirTags
gifts.description: Has your luggage arrived? Use these airtags for that piece of mind.

image.alt_text: Image of AirTags. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: NordVPN
gifts.description: We should all take the odd precaution when we travel. And this one means you can also download that next episode on Netflix

image.alt_text: Image of NordVPN. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Kindle Paperwhite
gifts.description: Why take 5 books when a kindle will do? An essential.

image.alt_text: Image of Kindle Paperwhite. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: DJI Mini 3 drone
gifts.description: Know a keen photographer? Or a big kid? This is a great addition to the packing list.

image.alt_text: Image of DJI Mini 3 drone. A great gift to give someone special.
Image of A safe travel adapter plug. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Gorilla griptight tripod
gifts.description: For the creator in your life - help them upgrade their travel pictures!

image.alt_text: Image of Gorilla griptight tripod. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Luxury eye mask
gifts.description: A bit of luxury for your eyes. Its larger than most eye mask brands so ideal for the man that needs some better shut eye.

image.alt_text: Image of Luxury eye mask. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum travel set
gifts.description: The must-have cosmetics of 2024 in a travel set!

image.alt_text: Image of Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum travel set. A great gift to give someone special.

gifts.name: Portable fan
gifts.description: We could all do we one from time to time but we often forget to buy one before it's too late. Solve that problem for them

image.alt_text: Image of Portable fan. A great gift to give someone special.
